item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 10, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Why we're helping more wikis move away from Fandom (313 points | 138 comments)
2. Let's talk about Animation Quality (84 points | 24 comments)
3. Show HN: Tenno – Markdown and JavaScript = an Hybrid of Word and Excel (70 points | 42 comments)
4. Internet Archive: Security breach alert (925 points | 515 comments)

6. Fun with Go Iterators (55 points | 22 comments)
7. Thunderbird Android client is K-9 Mail reborn, and it's in solid beta (47 points | 11 comments)
8. Dookie Demastered (713 points | 183 comments)
9. Automating Processes with Software Is Hard (79 points | 24 comments)
10. Why Gov.uk's Exit this Page component doesn't use the Escape key (327 points | 175 comments)
11. Owe Your Banker £1k You Are at His Mercy; Owe Him £1M the Position Is Reversed (63 points | 72 comments)
12. 'Entire ecosystem' of fossils 8.7M years old found under Los Angeles high school (37 points | 2 comments)
13. OS/2 TCPBEUI Name Resolution (53 points | 12 comments)
14. Portugal seeks to become low-tax haven for young people (20 points | 26 comments)

20. The Strict Aliasing Situation Is Pretty Bad (2016) (55 points | 31 comments)
21. WASM Is the New CGI (198 points | 217 comments)
22. Nixiesearch: Running Lucene over S3, and why we're building a new search engine (59 points | 44 comments)
23. Zod: TypeScript-first schema validation with static type inference (207 points | 158 comments)
24. Gboard Double Sided Version (75 points | 25 comments)
25. Indian entrepreneur, industrialist, and philanthropist, Ratan Tata, dead at 86 (276 points | 92 comments)
26. Open-TV: Ultra-fast, simple and powerful cross-platform IPTV app (50 points | 9 comments)
27. Show HN: FinetuneDB – AI fine-tuning platform to create custom LLMs (132 points | 61 comments)
28. Scrum's “Product Owner” Problem (56 points | 64 comments)
29. Quantum Advantage for NP Approximation (72 points | 30 comments)
30. Warm Handoffs (172 points | 40 comments)
